channel.title: Well this is bothering me
channel.description: Well I finally got Linux working with my wireless adapter using Ubuntu 11.04 (love it!) and everything is working fine. However, Ubuntu isn't detecting my monitor and there are blurry parts of my monitor that Windows 7 is able to sharpen. Does anyone know how to fix these blurry parts in Ubuntu?

item.title: Well this is bothering me
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:404736”]check online to see if there are any ubuntu updated drives for your video card, that could be my only guess =[/quote]Yeah, i got updated video drivers. The blur isn’t a huge problem, its just annoying is all.

Read full topic

item.title: Well this is bothering me
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

check online to see if there are any ubuntu updated drives for your video card, that could be my only guess =\

Read full topic
